name: A Not So Silent Night (TheDre)
description:
After a successful robbery, deep into the night, you suddenly become separated from your party. The forest is full of strange noices. Try to defend yourself and your loot, until your party finds you.

The game has rhythm components, so if you can link your attacks to the music, you can also earn more points towards the end.

This game was made in two weeks with the focus to create a game that would also be accessible to blind people.

The Team:

Wolf:              -               Programming

TheDre:          -                 Unity & Sounds

Anke:            -                 Art

We hope you enjoy our game!

Feedback is always welcome!
